title: 最大的澳洲署募簽平台上線喇

replies.msg:
Please help me to sign the following 3 petitions (EN1032, EN1029, EN1022) to the Parliament.of Australia. Thanks!

請大家幫忙簽署以下的聯署，目的其一希望澳洲政府將香港人權問題加入自由貿易協議（FTA）嘅條件，集眾人之聲音向政府反映於香港人權狀況嚴峻請協助香港人爭取民主的路途上考慮拒簽呢個協議，用經濟手段懲罰港共！同時爭取澳洲保護在民主自由上對抗極權而受到迫害的港人，希望能請澳洲在聯合國上為港人發聲。

Petition Request EN1032
Signature opens: 11/9/2019
Signature close: 9/10/2019
https://www.aph.gov.au/petition_list?id=EN1032

Petition Request EN1029
Signature opens: 11/9/2019
Signature close: 9/10/2019
https://www.aph.gov.au/petition_list?id=EN1029

Petition Request EN1022
Signature opens: 11/9/2019
Signature close: 9/10/2019
https://www.aph.gov.au/petition_list?id=EN1022

We therefore ask the House to consider passing a Special Bill to consider the granting the above request.

Petition to the Parliament House to add Human Right Clauses to the Free Trade Agreement with Hongkong.

For the House Of Representatives to consider granting asylum to Hong Kong Nationals in response to the alleged Hong Kong Police Brutality (under The UN Human Rights Office) and oppression of democracy of Hong Kong Nationals by the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region. 

We therefore ask the House to consider our case, as both the HKPF and Hong Kong government are displaying characteristics of poor or even violent governance, in attempt to suppress Hong Kong citizens’ right to peaceful protest. Moreover, we are writing with hope that you may bring the true condition of Hong Kong’s predicament to the United Nations Human Rights Council, with the ultimate goal that Hong Kong’s government and police force’s injustice and misconduct will be judged against the international rule of law.

已簽
P牌輕輕一推

推！！！
請即參與：#wtsappforhk campaign (#eye4hk 2.0)
https://lihkg.com/thread/1560141/page/1
已有手足推緊hashtag
有twitter既快啲retweet，無twitter既而家開番個
向外國人宣傳警暴！！！

國際線
1. retweet手足既呢條tweet, 記住comment加#wtsappforhk
https://twitter.com/hongkongers8/status/1171379846447919104?s=21
或者share以下既圖去twitter
2. 如果你選擇將10個電話重新打一次出黎，記得加+852
3. 叫埋外國人一齊Report俾WhatsApp聽，增加noise
尾數雙數先係business，單數係正常account
但係兩種acc都違反晒terms of service！！！
班狗想分散投資，不過我地要port到佢一條不留！

祝大家舉報愉快
